title: Stainless Steel Appliances, Luxurious resort-style pool
posting_body: This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 585 Sq.
Welcome to Alaya Hollywood, an exclusive and unique luxury apartment community with a supreme level of comfort and flair.
Open the door to resort style amenities and jet set designs that evoke poise and elegance, all located in one place.
Imagine entering a place where you can have the luxury to escape from your daily routine; a unique space to unplug and disconnect.
Enjoy the sights of the hills, while relaxing in the comfort of one of the most desired communities in Los Angeles.

Open living concept, Exceptional Hollywood views from a private terrace or balcony, Stainless Steel Appliances, Gourmet Kitchen with Ivory Quartz Countertops, Thoughtfully designed 1 Bedroom, 2 Bedroom, and Loft apartment homes., Energy efficient full-size stackable washer and dryer

24 hour fitness center, Luxurious resort-style pool, A vibrant, highly pedestrian friendly district that's flooded with incredible places to eat, drink, and shop., Deluxe community amenities with clean details and luminous qualities, BBQ and Fire Pits, Carefully designed spaces with Lushly landscaped grounds featuring tranquil water details, Club Lounge
Price and availability subject to change
